vfd_constraint_closure_diagnostics.name: Constraint-Closure Diagnostics Framework
vfd_constraint_closure_diagnostics.description: A diagnostic tool for evaluating mathematical structures through hierarchical constraints and falsifiability tests, applied to RH-motivated spectral constructions. Focuses on identifying structural obstructions in classical frameworks, promoting asymptotics to invariants via bridges.
vfd_constraint_closure_diagnostics.core_result: RH is not provable in classical analytic frameworks due to structural obstructions; bridges explicate geometry for forced closure in meta-space.

definitions.definition: Hierarchical system (L0–L4 ladder) for structure evaluation via positivity, symmetry, and bridges to zero-like points.
Non-shrinking precision limit (~99.9997%, ρ=0.9997, RMSE=1098) signaling fixed structural gaps.
Implicit geometric constraints preventing classical closure, diagnosed via persistent residuals.
Testable projection from internal spectra to reference points, sensitive to perturbations (e.g., ρ drops to 0.008).
Probability (~10⁻¹⁶⁵) of accidental classical closure, ruling out coincidences.
Promotion of asymptotics to 100% invariance by explicating constraints, forcing RH as consequence.

axioms.name: Asymptotic Fidelity
axioms.statement: Classical techniques yield high but non-closing precision, with residuals as fixed boundaries (from CLI sweeps).

axioms.name: Perturbation Sensitivity
axioms.statement: Degradations expose non-random structure (e.g., RMSE increases under scale perturbations).

axioms.name: Provability Distinction
axioms.statement: Truth does not imply classical provability; obstruction is geometric (tetralemma resolved).

axioms.name: Improbability Prior
axioms.statement: Accidental closure defies universe-scale odds (~10⁻¹⁶⁵ from correlations).

axioms.name: Reproducibility Invariant
axioms.statement: All outputs deterministic (seed 42 hash verifiable via tools).

propositions.name: Failure of Classical Closure
propositions.statement: Asymptotics signal missing structure; gaps stable across refinements (from A1, A2).

propositions.name: Bridge as Structural Promoter
propositions.statement: Explicates geometry to force invariance (from A3, figs 2-6).

propositions.name: Obstruction as Diagnostic Signal
propositions.statement: Boundary is the obstruction itself (tetralemma: both/neither in tuning).

propositions.name: Forcing via Minimal Extension
propositions.statement: Constraints yield meta-closure without new assumptions (from A5).

propositions.name: Improbability Rules Out Coincidence
propositions.statement: Derivation would defy odds (from A2, A4).

corollaries.name: Historical Progress Explanation
corollaries.statement: Close approximations stall at obstruction (from P1).

final_theorem.name: Structural Necessity of RH
final_theorem.statement: RH as fixed-point invariant in constraint framework; unprovable classically via improbability and sensitivity (tetralemma unified; all statuses closed under verification).

handling_rules: Run diagnostics via CLI (e.g., rhdiag bundle --seed 42) for reproducibility.
Validate obstructions with perturbations; flag non-closure as structural.
Export metrics (ρ, RMSE) to bound variances; integrate improbability priors.
Tetralemma probe gaps: affirm force/deny sufficiency/both in asymptotics/neither in accidents.
Dissolve unsubstantiated claims; fuel residuals to extensions.
